originalText.text: Brand New TV mounted ready for film evenings! Thanks Elay for your professional work, friendly manner, and straight forward transactions. Everything was neatly removed before the job, a thorough post job clean-up, and everything was returned to its original spot. So much care taken! Your number is definitely going to be saved on our family group as our family handyman.

text.text: Brand New TV mounted ready for film evenings! Thanks Elay for your professional work, friendly manner, and straight forward transactions. Everything was neatly removed before the job, a thorough post job clean-up, and everything was returned to its original spot. So much care taken! originalText.text:
Our front door was installed last fall and over the winter months the handle stopped turning and the lock was no longer flush - after putting off a fix for a while we were able to get a same day appointment with Blue sky
Handyman. He was able to get our door to close but did say that it would probably be a problem again in about two years or So, and we appreciated his honesty.
However, later in the afternoon we got a message that he believes the wrong part was used in the handle in the original installation, and he included the link to buy the part again (it was in the original box and the installer threw it out) with an explanation of how to fix.
We were highly impressed with this follow through, especialy on a Friday evening. Would definitely recommend

originalText.text: I had an event planned very last minute and needed the furniture assembled basically immediately. These guys happened to have an opening half an hour after I called, and a few hours after that our furniture-of-many-pieces were properly assembled and populated the apartment. It’s always such a fresh air when a service provider is so willing to accommodate some emergency one may have. Thank you! 5 stars for sure!

originalText.text: Everything was great. They hung a mirror for me and fixed a bifold door. Loved how friendly, talented and efficient they were. I was able to get an appointment within 24 hours and they were super accommodating. Will definitely book another home improvement project with them again

text.text: Everything was great. They hung a mirror for me and fixed a bifold door. Loved how friendly, talented and efficient they were. I was able to get an appointment within 24 hours and they were super accommodating. Will definitely book another home improvement project with them again

originalText.text: One thing for certain and two things for sure is that security is peace of mind and hiring the right contractor to get a good system up and running is crucial.  That being said I found a team from down here that had great reviews and great flat pricing.  They installed a 24 camera array at my gun range.  I found them online,  blue sky handyman  I have to be honest this is one of the best choices I’ve made.  I saved a ton of money and the system is top notch with night vision and zoom features.  I would call Elay  without hesitation if you need a video system done right.
